channel.title: Sweat shops
channel.description:
In resent update by Runescape.... Jagex said that the bots that WC Trees to sell in Real Life are ran by children who are forced to play RuneScape and work in China and Korea Sweat Shops.... HAHA! Don't believe me? Read yourself:
What's happening is more complex than it first seems. What's actually going on is that the VAST majority of the level-3 characters you see playing the game repetitively and not talking to anyone, are actually people from countries such as China and Korea, who are trying to collect RuneScape gold to sell for real world money (obviously against the rules). Some of them aren't even using bots, they are just playing the game very repetitively with a single-minded purpose to collect gold.
Unfortunately, these people are obliged to work such long hours and are paid such low wages that if even a tiny fraction of gold makes it to the market, those running the sweatshops will be encouraged to continue. This is why we are now further increasing our efforts.
[hr] Also there complaining about how they can't IP ban them (Proxies FTW):
We can (and do) ban them - including using IP bans - but they still find ways to make accounts.
[hr] Just remember when you buy RS Coins in RL your buying it from [img]http://lpa.igc.org/lpv45/lpp45_childlabor.jpg[/img]

item.title: Sweat shops
item.dc:creator: @animefreak animefreak
item.description:
@animefreak wrote:

1st if he posted this in runescape hed get flamed about sweatshops.

2nd lets not forget power in numbers and the currency exchange.

10 chinese cutting 5k yews an hour make like 1.5 mill in an hour. 7 hours = 10.5 mill = $ 94.5 = 735.15 hong kong dollars divide by 10 equals about 73 honk kong dollars each day… soo umm yeah they dont get much but they are getting extremely easy to earn money.

Read full topic

item.title: Sweat shops
item.dc:creator: @juessx juessx
item.description:
@juessx wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:16, topic:88070”][quote author=juessx link=topic=128974.msg1252631#msg1252631 date=1178104350]
I still don’t believe there are such things as people who play Runescape repetitively for money. It seems so obvious that it is a bot. Why would you not take less than 2 seconds and change your clothes to something else? They’re all green and default looking - so bot-like. “auto tutorial island”. China isn’t even a poor place anymore even? Unless it’s up in the mountains or something? (idk I’m an American Born Chinese so I’m pretty white washed…).
[/quote]COS TEH FASTER THEY GET IN, TEH FASTER THEY CAN MAKE THEIR 5 CENTS AND HOUR[/quote]

I think it’s RSDemon or something…

Read full topic
